DOC.brief_title: Full-mouth Periodontal Debridement Metronidazole Gel Patients With Chronic Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: Background . The benefit adjunctive metronidazole periodontal procedure smoker chronic periodontitis ( CP ) uncertain . The author compare effect metronidazole ( Mtz ) full-mouth periodontal debridement ( PD= 1 hour ultrasonic calculus/plaque removal ) smoker CP . Methods . This pilot study involve 30 Individuals ( least six teeth clinical attachment loss ≥ 5 mm probe pocket depth ( PPD ) ≥5 mm ) randomly assign three group ( n=10 ) : 1 ) PD plus 3 g placebo gel daily topical application 2 ) PD plus daily topical application 3 g 15 % Mtz benzoate gel ; 3 ) PD plus daily single dose 750 mg Mtz ( Flagyl® ) . Clinical parameter visible plaque index ( VPI ) , gingival bleed index ( GBI ) , relative attachment level ( RAL ) PPD ; quantitative analysis ( real-time PCR ) Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans , Porphyromonas gingivalis Tannerella forsythia assess baseline , 1 , 3 6 month PD .
